name: Roll2Attack
description:
Survive against the endless waves of enemies by pick-up dice and throwing them like the little goblin you are! 

This submission to the GMTK 2022 Game Jam is my first public game. I love the theme "Roll of the Dice" because of my small RPG dice collection. Thank you in advance for any advice. 

Gameplay: You run around the map to grab dice and throw them at enemies. Any enemies the dice pass through will be targeted and only take damage once the dice finishes rolling. The more enemies that are defeated, the faster and more durable the enemies will become.

Controls: Move w/ wasd, press space to start, and use the left mouse button to throw dice throw the cursor. 

Known Issues: Dice sometimes disappear when throwing them while near an outer wall. 'Ghost dice' will sometimes appear when grabbing overlapping dice. The damage indicator won't appear if enemies are defeated in one shot. Enemies will sometimes spawn on top of the player.

Made w/ LÖVE
